comments:
Open the RCP Mail ViewPart in VE and drop another Shell on the freeform. Now try
to reparent the 'parent' argument of the ViewPart to the Shell - the following
exception is thrown.

The problem was that the code that tried to see whether something could be
reparented was checking for scoping of the source and seeing what method its
parent was created in.  The implicit Composite had no parent and hence the NPE.
 This is fixed and also there was a problem with another method that was doing a
bad class cast to an IRectangleProxy having just got a contol so with both fixes
it now seems to be OK and I did some smoke testing moving composites around.
